    • Uses of SWActor in starwars.actions

      Methods in starwars.actions with parameters of type SWActor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Train.act(SWActor a) 
      void Take.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Take action by setting the item carried by the SWActor to the target ( the SWActor a's item carried would be the target of this Take).
      void Repair.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Repair action by placing droid parts to the disabled droids (the SWActor a's item carried would be the target of this Take).
      void Owned.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Owned action by setting the droids by the SWActor to the target ( the SWActor a's droids would be the target of this Owned).
      void Move.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Move action.
      void MindControl.act(SWActor a) 
      void Leave.act(SWActor a) 
      void Healing.act(SWActor a) 
      void Fill.act(SWActor a) 
      void Disowned.act(SWActor a) 
      void Disassemble.act(SWActor a) 
      void Dip.act(SWActor a) 
      void Attack.act(SWActor a)
      Perform the Attack command on an entity.
      boolean Train.canDo(SWActor a)
      Determine whether a particular SWActor a can attack the target.
      boolean Take.canDo(SWActor a)
      Returns if or not this Take can be performed by the SWActor a.
      boolean Repair.canDo(SWActor a) 
      boolean Owned.canDo(SWActor a)
      Returns if or not this Owned can be performed by the SWActor a.
      boolean Move.canDo(SWActor a)
      Returns if or not a SWActor a can perform a Move command.
      boolean MindControl.canDo(SWActor a)
      Determine whether a particular SWActor a can attack the target.
